page.title: 08RESERVOIR, COLD ASHTON AREA.
page.content: { Monkswood reservoir}is 365 feet above sea level and is owned by{Wessex {Water Board.}It is really 2 reservoirs one built in 1876 ,holding one million gallons of water and another built in 1896, after the introduction of the flush toilet,holding 51 million gallons.They supply the city of{Bath. A{keeper}lives in the house nearby. He checks daily the clay dam, water levels and rainfall.Maintenance gangs now do grass cutting and repairs instead of each keeper being responsible for his own reservoir. The{water}comes from 150 springs in the area and is so pure it only needs straining through copper gauze and chlorinating.Wessex Water Board own the farms in the area,to enable them to monitor the use of sprays, sileage and fertilizers to ensure the water is {polution}free at all times.
